description: This sriracha chicken drumstick recipe is sure to become a family favourite. Serve the chicken with crunchy slaw and rice and beat the midweek dinner rush.
keywords: Sriracha Chicken Drumsticks with Asian Slaw
name: Sriracha Chicken Drumsticks with Asian Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 520 g pkt Woolworths crunchy noodle coleslaw kit

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, make slaw according to packet instructions. Heat rice according to packet instructions. Serve chicken with slaw and rice.
